full_text:
Form No.54
Order of Acquittal of accused on compounding offences out of court under
Sec.320(8)Cr.P.C.
Proceedings of the Additional Chief Judicial Magistrate,
Thiruvananthapuram.
Present: Elsa Catherine George
Additional Chief Judicial Magistrate.
Wednesday the 5" day of March 2025
CC: 905/2017
Complainant: State represented by the Sub Inspector of Police,
Medical College Police Station in Crime No.
121/2017
(By A.PP. )
Accused: Varghese, 44 years, S/o Leyon, Leyon House,
T.C 80/1561, Near Vettukad Church,
Kadakampally Village.
(By Adv. Sri. Ajith Kumar S.R)
Offence: Punishable u/s 406, 420 and 506(i) of IPC
ORDER
The offence having been compounded out of court/with the permission of
court accused is acquitted U/s.320(8) Cr.P.C.
¢
Kee . e®@
. Reavis .
Elsa Catherine George,
Additional Chief Judicial Magistrate,
Thiruvananthapuram.
Date of Offence : 03/08/2024
Date of Complaint : 02/05/2017
Date of Order : 05/03/2025
